data.title: Game names that could belong to a band / Band names that could belong to a game
data.meta_description: This can be a bad thread but maybe it can be fun. I was thinking that although it is kind of common to have band names' referencing movies (like Wu-Tang...
data.text:
This can be a bad thread but maybe it can be fun. I was thinking that although it is kind of common to have band names' referencing movies (like Wu-Tang Clan, JAWS) or TV shows (Twin Peaks, Ross from Friends) and, it is kinda common to nod games in lyrics, but there is only one band that was named after a game which I know about (Deerhunter) and only two other referencing something from a game in general (Hadouken! and Ratatat).

This got me thinking about band names that could be a games' name and vice-versa.

In some cases I think the band could sound like the game already sounds even, like Devil May Cry playing something akin to DMC3 soundtrack or Streets of Rage playing 90's techno. In other cases I imagine they could be something completely different.

Examples:

God of War - Totally a sludge metal band

Persona - Could be any kind of alternative rock/electronic band

Mass Effect - Could be anything, really

Rainbow Six - 80's electropop

But I think it's more interesting to think about how a game named like a band would be, like:

Run the Jewels - Could be an indie game like Monaco

Arcade Fire - Run'n gun Contra Style

The Killers - Some Ubisoft AAA game

Sonic Youth - More like Sonic Wings than Sonic The Hedgehog

Justice - Early 2000's first person shooter

Lets spit out some more ideas for both :)

Eurythmics - Launch title for Nintendo DS. Quirky puzzle game.

Three Dog Night - Indie game. Survive three nights in a haunted mansion filled with deadly dogs.

Earth, Wind & Fire - From the makers of Journey comes a game that will have you question the elements of your life.

ABBA - Automatic Barrier Barrage Armageddon. It's 49 cents on the eShop for some reason.

The Doors - Don't look now, it's yet another P.T. mod.

The Who - Guess which one of your friends is not your friend. Jackbox Party Pack exclusive.

Tears for Fears - Don't look now, it's yet another P.T. mod.

The Cure - You are Leoj, a grizzled mercenary tasked with protecting a girl named Eille.

Culture Club - Ordinary high school student <PlayerName> never expected <Thing>...

Toto - A young boy is swept up by a storm and marooned on an island where he befriends a dog. Bring tissues.

The Human League - It's like League of Legends. But more human.

Iron Maiden - Prepare to Die Edition.

A Flock of Seagulls - It's a lovely summer on the beach, and you are a horrible flock.
